actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude $1,000 of interest from savings from the gross income of certain taxpayers.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income interest earned on savings deposits. Limits such exclusion to $1,000 per taxpayer with a dollar per dollar reduction in the exclusion for taxpayers with income in excess of specified levels.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude $1,000 of interest from savings from the gross income of certain taxpayers.
